name: Parents' Date Night / Kids' Movie Night
description: Open to kids ages 4 years-9 months old to 11 years old. ​ Enjoy a well-deserved fun night out while your kid(s) have fun at Aventuras. Date Night includes a delicious and nutritious dinner (a main dish from a nearby restaurant, plus a side of fruit & veggies), play a few games, and watch a movie -- with a side of popcorn. ​ Monthly on the 3rd Friday of the month - 6:15 - 9:30 pm at the Noe Valley location - 1513 Church St.
fullDescription: Open to kids ages 4 years-9 months old to 11 years old. ​ Enjoy a well-deserved fun night out while your kid(s) have fun at Aventuras. Date Night includes a delicious and nutritious dinner (a main dish from a nearby restaurant, plus a side of fruit & veggies), play a few games, and watch a movie -- with a side of popcorn. ​ Monthly on the 3rd Friday of the month - 6:15 - 9:30 pm at the Noe Valley location - 1513 Church St.
howToGetIt: Book your spot on the calendar widget at the bottom of the page (after you click link)
cost: $50 per child, $45 for siblings (with promo Code "HERMAN@" at checkout). Includes dinner, fun activities, a movie and popcorn.
